title: Some things are just plain too strong...
body:
Noble, Jinx, Draven. I don't like being in a meta that has comps titled "Protect Jinx." or "Protect Draven." Racing to get Noble, Guardian + a carry makes this game extremely stale.

Karthus, A. Sol., Veigar is still too potent of a trio. Sorcerers just one shot everything. God forbid I can get my hands on one cloak in a game with these nuts.

 Ashe single-handedly winning fights 1v3 is getting annoying. Ranger + Glacial is MEGA STUPID, but it's relatively balanced compared to those^ fools. 

Finally, Assassins/Ninja is a really, really good comp. Sadly, since the introduction of 4 new heroes its extremely hard to go this comp in any scenario unless I force them from the start and sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't. Banking on that Akali to drop...

replies.body: Nobles shouldn't have been changed to include MR.  they went from being "great against physical, poor against magic" to well-rounded defensively against everything, with the balance team overly relying on the true dmg void buffs to offset the nobles buff.  I'm not saying void didn't need a buff, they did, but nobles didn't.  people were complaining more about 6 knights being crappy rather than 6 nobles, but it seems like they buffed 6 nobles more than they did 6 knights.....of course, 6 nobles also got a slight buff from the knights buff since 2 knights are inherently present due to garen and kayle.
Absolutely agree.  I'm sick of every game just being a race for noble.  Draven and Jinx need small nerfs, Noble needs a big nerf.
